qas.question: Who did not connect with the soldier?
What did Mahan believe he was innovating?
What had already been there to be seen?

context: Apparently <a0_0>the sailor<a0_0/> did not connect with the soldier, as Mahan believed he was innovating <a1_0><a2_0>the term Middle East<a2_0/><a1_0/>. It was, however, already there to be seen.
